channel.title: design on Embedded Systems Design
channel.description: Recent content in design on Embedded Systems Design

item.title: Particle Argon Wifi Board
item.description: What is the Particle Argon? What does it do? The Particle Argon is a “wi-fi for everything” development kit that includes a microcontroller, wi-fi hardware, and easy-to-use web-based IDE (Integrated Development Environment).

item.title: Software design
item.description: What is a finite state machine? A finite state machine (FSM) is a way of modeling a system such that there are a limited number of finite “states” that a system can be in, and that it can only be in one of those states at a time.
